title: Chi-square statistic for restaurant dinner type

content.prompt: Assume each order is independent. For which type of dinner is the value of its contribution to the appropriate test statistic the greatest?

topic.text: 8.3: Carrying out a Chi-Square Goodness of Fit Test

skill.text: Skill 3.E: Calculate a test statistic and find a p-value, provided conditions for inference are met.
